name: Aaron Allen
summary: Senior Mobile Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying high-performance iOS and Android applications. Strong expertise in React Native and native mobile development concepts, with hands-on experience integrating mobile apps with scalable backend services using Node.js, FastAPI, and modern APIs. Proven ability to deliver secure, responsive, and reliable mobile solutions with a focus on performance optimization, offline-first architectures, and robust testing strategies. Experienced in CI/CD automation for mobile pipelines, Agile development, and mentoring engineers to deliver production-grade mobile applications in fast-paced environments.
